contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|modus}} '''Modus''' may refer to: * Modus, the Latin name for [[grammatical mood]], in linguistics * Modus, the Latin name for [[mode (statistics)]] * [[Modus (company)]], an Alberta based company * [[Modus (medieval music)]], a term used in several different technical meanings in medieval music theory * The [[Renault Modus]], a small car * [[Modus (band)]], a pop music band in former Czechoslovakia * [[Modus (Modus album)|''Modus'' (Modus album)]], 1979 * [[Modus (P·A·L album)|''Modus'' (P·A·L album)]], 2006 * [[Modus FX]], a visual effects company based in Sainte-Thérèse, Quebec, Canada ==See also== * [[Modus operandi]] * [[Modus operandi (disambiguation)]] * [[Modus vivendi]] {{disambiguation}}
